text: Ballinluig railway station served the village of Ballinluig, Perth and Kinross, Scotland from 1863 to 1965 on the Inverness and Perth Junction Railway. == History == The station opened on 1 June 1863 by the Inverness and Perth Junction Railway. The station closed to both passengers and good traffic on 3 May 1965. == References == == External links == Category:Disused railway stations in Perth and Kinross Category:Railway stations in Great Britain opened in 1863 Category:Railway stations in Great Britain closed in 1965 Category:Beeching closures in Scotland Category:1863 establishments in Scotland Category:1965 disestablishments in Scotland Category:Former Highland Railway stations
title: Ballinluig railway station
